meanings.definition: The quality or state of being heartless.
meanings.sent1: Her heartlessnesses towards animals was evident in her refusal to adopt a rescue dog.
meanings.sent2: The heartlessnesses of the villain in the movie made the audience despise him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his heartlessnesses, he couldn't resist helping the injured bird he found in the park.
meanings.sent4: The heartlessnesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The heartlessnesses of the dictator were felt by all who dared to oppose him.

meanings.definition: Actions or behavior lacking compassion or empathy.
meanings.sent1: The heartlessnesses of the bullies made the school a hostile environment for many students.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the heartlessnesses of the company's decision to lay off long-time employees.
meanings.sent3: The heartlessnesses of the cat stealing the dog's bed made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The heartlessnesses of the cold wind cut through her thin jacket.
meanings.sent5: The heartlessnesses of the traffic jam caused frustration among the commuters.
